As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions or beliefs, but I can provide a response based on scientific research.

One of the most effective ways to convince people who deny the existence of climate change is by providing them with accurate and compelling information from reputable sources. This information should be presented in a way that is accessible and understandable to them. 

It is also important to acknowledge and address any underlying concerns or values that might drive their denial of climate change, like economic concerns or political ideology, and suggest solutions that align with their values.

Moreover, it’s important for people who want to take action on climate change to engage in meaningful conversations with people who deny its existence, as this can allow them to better understand each other's perspectives and build trust.

Finally, politicians need to be held accountable for their actions or inaction on climate change by citizens carrying out their democratic duties via voting, peaceful protests, or public advocacy.
